title: Bill Engvall, Live from Wisegues in Salt Lake City (ACS August 30)
itunes:title: Bill Engvall, Live from Wisegues in Salt Lake City (ACS August 30)
description:
Adam performs live at Wiseguys Comedy Club in Salt Lake City. He begins the show lamenting over Utah's unusual alcohol policies and teases an audience member for drinking his beer through a straw. Legendary comedian Bill Engvall joins Adam on stage to chat about living in Utah and his upcoming farewell show at the end of the year.  Gina and Bryan join remotely from California and they all play a round of The Rotten Tomatoes Game. Next, Gina reports news stories on a pizza-related stabbing, dogs crying tears of joy, and laughing gas being used for childbirth. Lastly, Bill joins in for a round of 'Adam Carolla is Unprepared,' taking audience suggestions for topics to laugh about.

THANKS FOR SUPPORTING TODAY’S SPONSORS:

Geico.com

The Jordan Harbinger Show
